title: Champion Grades
body:
So what effects it. Does losing effect the score? Does getting 1 death mean you can't get an S?

Cause i played a ARAM game as Morgana i own her.
And my score was 12/4/40 and i lost.
I played a normal game with my friend
and their score was 4/6/23 and they got S- (I think. It's that or S)
I'm sad right now

replies.body: There are tons of factors ranging from kda to cs to wards in some cases. I've had many games where I get an A+ even though we win and go 11/0 with better cs compared to my team. Feels bad.
